section.title: The community platform where you can lend, borrow, donate, sell objects or offer services in a simple and secure way.

hero.headline: Share, Exchange and
hero.subtitle: LaCherada is the platform where you can lend, borrow, donate or sell objects safely with people in your community.

lendBorrow.title: Lend & Borrow
lendBorrow.subtitle: Objects you need
lendBorrow.description: Exchange objects you have for things you need. Save money and reduce waste.

donate.title: Donate & Help
donate.subtitle: Your community
donate.description: Donate objects you no longer use and help other community members while freeing up space.

sell.title: Sell Easy
sell.subtitle: No complications
sell.description: Sell your second-hand objects quickly and safely to people close to you.

benefits.title: What Can You Do on LaCherada?
benefits.subtitle: A complete platform for all your community exchange needs

cta.title: Ready to Join the Exchange Revolution?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of people who are already sharing, saving and connecting in their community.

howItWorks.title: How Does LaCherada Work?
howItWorks.subtitle: In just 3 simple steps you can start exchanging, donating or selling with your community safely and reliably.

register.title: 1. Register
register.subtitle: Create your profile
register.description: Create your free account and complete your profile with basic information. Verify your identity to build trust in the community.

publish.title: 2. Publish or Search
publish.subtitle: Find what you need
publish.description: Publish the objects you want to lend, donate or sell. Or search among thousands of items available in your area.

connect.title: 3. Connect and Exchange
connect.subtitle: Complete the transaction
connect.description: Contact other users directly, agree on terms and complete the exchange safely.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose LaCherada?
whyChoose.subtitle: More than an exchange platform, we are a community committed to responsible consumption and circular economy.

saveMoney.title: Save Money
saveMoney.description: Get what you need without overspending

community.title: Local Community
community.description: Connect with people in your area

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Reduce waste and take care of the planet

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

auth.name: Name
auth.emailSentDescription: Check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
auth.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
auth.termsDescription: By signing up, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy
auth.recoverAccessDescription: Don't worry, it's normal to forget passwords. We'll help you recover access to your account quickly and securely.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions or need help? Our team is ready to assist you.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: We're here to help you. Choose your preferred contact method and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

email.title: Email
email.description: Write to us for general inquiries

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.name: Full name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

items.question: How can I register on LaCherada?
items.answer: Registration is free and simple. You just need to provide your email, create a password and verify your account.

items.question: Is it safe to exchange objects with strangers?
items.answer: Yes, we have a user verification and rating system that ensures safe transactions. We always recommend meeting in public places.

items.question: What types of objects can I publish?
items.answer: You can publish almost any legal object: electronics, tools, books, clothes, household items and much more.

wizard.displayNameNote: This is the name that other users will see
wizard.completeProfileLater: You can complete your profile later from settings

validation.firstNameMaxLength: First name cannot be more than 50 characters
validation.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameMaxLength: Last name cannot be more than 50 characters
